summary: Completed comprehensive testing of VidSaver YouTube video downloader. All core features working correctly including video info fetching, format selection, download process, and file serving. Fixed critical backend bugs during testing.
passed_tests: Homepage loads with hero section, input form, and footer
YouTube URL input and validation working
Video information fetching (title, thumbnail, duration, formats)
Download success message and functional download link
Error handling for invalid URLs working properly
Loading states during fetch and download operations
Responsive design on mobile (390x844) and tablet (768x1024)
All 8 backend API endpoints passing tests
Complete workflow from URL input to video download
